nodes.bodyText: > is in line with the other parts of these documents and the owner prefers the consistency.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -62,11 +62,12 @@ new release is available on Maven Central.
 * Manually edit and update any pom.xml files in https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/java-docs-samples that dependabot missed
     * Go to go/java-live
     * Sort by title
-    * Scroll down until you find the section with titles "chore(deps): update dependency com.google.cloud:libraries-bom to v<version>"
-   * Approve and merge these PRs.
+    * Scroll down until you find the section with titles "chore(deps): update dependency com.google.cloud:libraries-bom to v<version>"
+    * Approve and merge these PRs.
+      For PRs waiting for Kokoro jobs, add the "kokoro:force-run" label.
 * In google3 run:
     * `$ g4d -f bom`
-    *  `/google/src/head/depot/google3/devtools/scripts/replace_string "<version>oldVersion</version>" "<version>newVersion</version>"`
+    *  `/google/src/head/depot/google3/devtools/scripts/replace_string "<version>oldVersion</version>" "<version>newVersion</version>"`

nodes.bodyText: There are many documents and many owners, who do not always agree. One purpose of the style guide is to resolve these disagreements once and for all rather than switching back and forth in every other cl to satisfy the individual preference of the reviewer.
